text: Oswaldtwistle is a town in Lancashire county near Accrington in North West England. Many years ago, Oswaldtwistle had a running textile mill, which is a presentation today. == Other websites == *Life and Times of Oswaldtwistle *Rhyddings Business and Enterprise School, Oswaldtwistle *Melbourne Street Church, Oswaldtwistle Category:Towns in Lancashire
title: Oswaldtwistle
